HiddenText.Name: Do I have to be a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints to take classes at BYU-Idaho?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Do I have to be a member of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints to take classes at BYU-Idaho?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: No.  People who are willing to live the BYU-Idaho Honor Code and receive an ecclesiastical endorsement from their local church leader can take BYU-Idaho classes.
